greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A061395(n), A046523(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pairing Function
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
A061395(n) = if(1==n, 0, primepi(vecmax(factor(n)[, 1]))); \\ After _M. F. Hasler_'s code for A006530.
def T(n, m): return ((n + m)**2 - n - 3*m + 2)/2
return sorted([f[i] for i in f])
def a061395(n): return 0 if n == 1 else primepi(max(primefactors(n)))
def a(n): return T(a061395(n), a046523(n)) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 09 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 09 2017
